generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and bordered by vegetation and parked cars.
- building: Several buildings are visible along the street, including one with a "HOSTEL" sign on its facade.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some bushes are present along the sidewalks and road edges.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the tree canopy, appearing as a pale, overcast area.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sides of the road, including a white convertible on the left and a black SUV on the right.
- truck: A large truck with a metal frame and a cargo container is visible in the center of the road, driving away from the camera.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Stopping" traffic sign (blue circle with a red border and a red diagonal line) is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance, near the center of the image.
